Be a part of one of North America's leading financial institutions. Come join a dynamic, fast paced team in a cutting edge environment.

SNR. PERL PROGRAMMER

You have very strong Perl development skills with a minimum of 2 years recent hands on PERL LANGUAGE programming skills. (not CGI)

In addition you have senior hands on C++ experience.
Min 2 years SQL
Min 1.5 years of Java
Shell Scripting experience
MUST HAVE financial application experience.

This position involves software development of RISK MANAGEMENT system applications in a team setting. Write high-quality and well-documented code using Perl, C++, Java, Unix Shell & SQL following the department's coding
standards.

Typical day will be an average of...
80% Perl programming
7% of C++ programming
7% of Unix Shell programming
6% SQL

later more Java instead of Perl.
Write and execute alpha unit test cases; assist with integration; 2nd level
support and user acceptance testing.

Additional Information
Salary: CAD 60,000.00 to CAD 70,000.00 per year
plus bonus
Position Type: Full Time, Permanent
Ref Code: RS2002-06-07-1
